sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.description: One- to three-page description of the project

sections.name: Initiating
sections.description: Statement of the problem and project scope

sections.name: Planning and Organizing
sections.description: Project goals, human resource management plan, schedule, quality management plan, risk management plan, proposed project budget

sections.name: Execution
sections.description: Description and documentation of the project plan implementation

sections.name: Monitoring and Controlling
sections.description: Monitoring schedule, budget and project quality; issues and how you dealt with them

sections.name: Closing the Project
sections.description: Evaluation of key metrics, lessons learned, recommendations for future projects

sections.name: Appearance and Word Usage
sections.description: Professional layout, neatness, proper grammar, spelling and word usage
